coreAtributes.name: Platemail Pauldron
coreAtributes.description: A pair of hevay metal shoulder guards with layered plate metal protecting the upper arms.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your platemail pauldrons.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s platemail pauldrons and roughly pull them off [npc.her] shoulders.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your platemail pauldrons and roughly pulls them off your shoulders.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail pauldrons and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her] shoulders.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the platemail pauldrons.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s platemail pauldrons on [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the platemail pauldrons on [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your platemail pauldrons on your shoulders.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the platemail pauldrons on your shoulders.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s platemail pauldrons on their shoulders.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail pauldrons and roughly puts them on [npc2.her] shoulders.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your platemail pauldrons.

displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail pauldrons and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her] shoulders.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the platemail pauldrons.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s platemail pauldrons on [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the platemail pauldrons on [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your platemail pauldrons on your shoulders.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the platemail pauldrons on your shoulders.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s platemail pauldrons off on their shoulders.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail pauldrons and roughly puts them on [npc2.her] shoulders.
